LayoutNode.Content: I purchased 2 of them and they are both doing great. Can be used with other GSM carriers.
LayoutNode.SRC: I purchased 2 of them and they are both doing great. Can be used with other GSM carriers.
7326

LayoutNode.Content: I love this phone! A few months ago my old phone broke so I purchased an inexpensive one atWalmart (under $40) to get me thru the summer. The phone didn't hold a charge, I couldn't getservice at my house thanks to Family Mobiles change from Tmobile to Tracphone. The phonewas the worst and only lasted 3 weeks. I wisely switched from Family Mobile to Verizon andpurchased this Moto E when I changed. I was apprehensive to purchase another cheap phonebut I did and I have to say this phone is awesome!! I really recommend it. See more
LayoutNode.SRC:
I love this phone! A few months ago my old phone broke so I purchased an inexpensive one at Walmart (under $40) to get me thru the summer. The phone didn't hold a charge, I couldn't get service at my house thanks to Family Mobiles change from Tmobile to Tracphone. The phone was the worst and only lasted 3 weeks. I wisely switched from Family Mobile to Verizon and purchased this Moto E when I changed. I was apprehensive to purchase another cheap phone but I did and I have to say this phone is awesome!! I really recommend it.
See more
6612

LayoutNode.Content: I'm coming from an iPhone 7, and I'm actually really impressed with this phone. It's really fastand responsive, there are some pretty cool features that come with the phone & it having thelatest Android system. The camera is probably what I'm most impressed by, it's obviously notthe best but I think it's pretty nice. The flash on the front is pretty cool for selfies. The Emojisaren't the best but I was more than happy to see you can change the colors and it has a lot ofnew emojis added like iPhone. You can't go wrong with getting this phone for the price,performance and Verizon's network. Highly recommend for those on a budget. See more
LayoutNode.SRC:
I'm coming from an iPhone 7, and I'm actually really impressed with this phone. It's really fast and responsive, there are some pretty cool features that come with the phone & it having the latest Android system. The camera is probably what I'm most impressed by, it's obviously not the best but I think it's pretty nice. The flash on the front is pretty cool for selfies. The Emojis aren't the best but I was more than happy to see you can change the colors and it has a lot of new emojis added like iPhone. You can't go wrong with getting this phone for the price, performance and Verizon's network. Highly recommend for those on a budget.
See more
4712

LayoutNode.Content: A Nougat smartphone for $40 that isn't laggy?!
LayoutNode.SRC: A Nougat smartphone for $40 that isn't laggy?!

LayoutNode.Content: I've had this phone a week now with no issues, it's just a really good phone. I obviously wasn'tgoing to expect miracles here but it's nonetheless the best deal out there. The specs arealready on here but here's the take-away: + 5" 720 HD IPS 2.5d screen + 8MP rear/5MP frontcamera w rear AND front LED flash + 4G LTE support, dual-band wifi, BT, and GPS + 1.4Ghzquadcore processor + 16GB memory, 2 GB RAM + Support for nano SIM and microsd +Android 7.1.1 "Nougat" + Fingerprint reader w/ one-button navigation + Front-facing speaker -Locked to Verizon prepaid Specs that are fitting for the price with some surprising extras likethe front LED flash, fingerprint reader, one button navigation, front speaker, and dual band.So...you get ALL THAT for $40 right now. BUY BUY BUY! See more
LayoutNode.SRC:
I've had this phone a week now with no issues, it's just a really good phone. I obviously wasn't going to expect miracles here but it's nonetheless the best deal out there. The specs are already on here but here's the take-away: + 5" 720 HD IPS 2.5d screen + 8MP rear/5MP front camera w rear AND front LED flash + 4G LTE support, dual-band wifi, BT, and GPS + 1.4Ghz quadcore processor + 16GB memory, 2 GB RAM + Support for nano SIM and microsd + Android 7.1.1 "Nougat" + Fingerprint reader w/ one-button navigation + Front-facing speaker - Locked to Verizon prepaid Specs that are fitting for the price with some surprising extras like the front LED flash, fingerprint reader, one button navigation, front speaker, and dual band. So...you get ALL THAT for $40 right now. BUY BUY BUY!
See more

LayoutNode.Content: Excellent price, fast easy delivery! Easy to use and understand, the fingerprint identity is cool!Does not have to be used on verizon, in fact, I love how it was simple to switch to anothercarrier, (straight talk), simply put in sim card and done!! loud speakers, great amount of spaceplus a slot for sd card. I have nothing to complain about on this phone! I recommend gettingone before they realize how cheap they are selling them and jack the price up!! See more
LayoutNode.SRC:
Excellent price, fast easy delivery! Easy to use and understand, the fingerprint identity is cool! Does not have to be used on verizon, in fact, I love how it was simple to switch to another carrier, (straight talk), simply put in sim card and done!! loud speakers, great amount of space plus a slot for sd card. I have nothing to complain about on this phone! I recommend getting one before they realize how cheap they are selling them and jack the price up!!
See more
